sourcesContent:
import {Component, inject} from '@angular/core'; import {FormBuilder, Validators,} from "@angular/forms"; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', template: `
CoinSplit

Create new Account

*password does not match

Already have an account? Sign in

`, styles: [ ] }) export class SignupComponent { passwordMatch= true; signupForm= inject(FormBuilder).group({ fullname: ['',[Validators.required, Validators.min(3)]], email: ['',[Validators.required,Validators.email]], password:['',[Validators.required,Validators.min(8),Validators.pattern('^(?=.*\\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\\W).+$')]], rePassword:['',[Validators.required,Validators.min(8),Validators.pattern('^(?=.*\\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\\W).+$')]], }) signUp(){ console.log(this.signupForm.status) } comparePassword(){ this.passwordMatch = this.signupForm.value.password === this.signupForm.value.rePassword; } }
